author: Animalogic
description:
We're going to Morocco to save monkeys. The Barbary macaque is one of the most amazing monkeys in the world, and the last living monkey in Europe. Humans have enjoyed watching them for millennia, and have kept them as pets, often illegally. This led to a crash in the wild population that almost made them go extinct. The tide is finally turning, but are we saving these monkeys fast enough?

Get your copy of "Strange Creatures" now! It’s filled with all the amazing animal facts and beautiful original illustrations that you’ve come to love from us. 📗🐾 Order here: http://bit.ly/animalogicbook

00:23 What Is a Barbary Macaque?
02:53 The Illegal Pet Trade
05:30 Rescue & Rehabilitation
10:26 Tourism vs Wildlife
13:02 Mating & Social Life
16:03 Macaque Release

author: Animalogic
description:
